articles.content:
Richarlison attracted interest from Arsenal and Chelsea before his move to Spurs (Shutterstock)
Richarlison has revealed that Chelsea failed with an offer before his move to Tottenham this summer.

articles.title: Emma Raducanu retires injured as Jelena Ostapenko reaches Korea Open final - Sky Sports
articles.description: Emma Raducanu retired in the third set of her Korea Open semi-final against Latvian top seed Jelena Ostapenko.
articles.content:
Emma Raducanu retired in the third set of her Korea Open semi-final against Latvian top seed Jelena Ostapenko.
